content.question: Identify the photographer of the work shown. How did the photographer’s work expand traditional modes of representation? How did the photographer’s work influence painting?

frqParts.text: Identify the photographer of the work shown. How did the photographer’s work expand traditional modes of representation? How did the photographer’s work influence painting?

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
